metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, What's On Your Mind (Pure Energy) is more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: What's On Your Mind (Pure Energy) has sections analyzed in the following keys: A Minor, D Dorian,  and F Mixolydian.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
